THE ORIGINAL OF THE BEST SERIES EVER

I love this game too much. Brings back so many memories with friends you had LAN-parties with where you just sat and played all summer long in your parents garage with junk snacks and cheap soda.

Also as a Swede, I am proud to say that this was our e-Sport national game and that Sweden was among the top countries in the world to achieve glory.

Thank you Counter-Strike for the memories.
